arts.sum: Real Madrid star Vinícius Jr. has taken to social media on Saturday night, to provide his response to the latest brilliance conjured up by teammate Kylian Mbappé. The name of…

arts.ttl: Hat-trick hero Kylian Mbappe returns to form in style as Real Madrid extend lead
arts.sum: Mbappe shrugged off an indifferent and injury-hit campaign as he combined brilliantly with Jude Bellingham to fire Real’s opening goal.

arts.ttl: Kylian Mbappe: Confident Real Madrid need to push hard for La Liga title
arts.sum: Kylian Mbappe has called on Real Madrid not to slow down in the La Liga title race. After 21 games played, Los Blancos now have a four point lead over second place Atletico Madrid, after trailing at the start of 2025. Top spot has already changed hands a few times in the opening weeks of […] The post Kylian Mbappe: Confident Real Madrid need to push hard for La Liga title appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: Carlo Ancelotti: “David Alaba is very close to his first start”
arts.sum: After the match, Ancelotti was asked about David Alaba’s appearance and how close he is to start, to which he said: “Little by little, Alaba is starting to play more minutes. All teams try to win, you might think it was an easy match, but we thought about it later.

arts.ttl: Kylian Mbappe Scores Sensational First Hat Trick for Real Madrid
arts.sum: Kylian Mbappé bagged his first hat trick of his Real Madrid career against Real Valladolid.

arts.ttl: Mbappe hat-trick and Real Madrid move further up the table
arts.sum: Madrid's fourth straight win in the league combined with Atletico Madrid's 1-1 draw with Villarreal let Carlo Ancelotti's side open a four-point gap over its city rival. K ylian Mbappé scored his first hat trick for Real Madrid in a 3-0 win at struggling Valladolid and helped to extend its lead of La Liga on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Real Valladolid 0-3 Real Madrid: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Kylian Mbappe shows signs of his best with glorious hat trick
arts.sum: Kylian Mbappe scores three times as Real Madrid record a 3-0 victory over struggling Real Valladolid in Saturday night's La Liga contest at Estadio Jose Zorrilla.

arts.ttl: Real Valladolid 0–3 Real Madrid: Player Ratings As Kylian Mbappe Stars for Los Blancos
arts.sum: Kylian Mbappé's hat trick secured all three points for Real Madrid against Real Valladolid.
